save() - Method in class simulator.Simulator
 
scannerKeyboard - Variable in class util.Input
Object-oriented instance variable, but since only one Input can ever be created, only one Scanner object will ever be created.
serialize(ObjectOutputStream) - Method in class army.Army
 
setArmyAllegiance(Army) - Method in class actor.Actor
 
setHasHorse(boolean) - Method in class actor.Wizard
 
setHasStaff(boolean) - Method in class actor.Wizard
 
setHealth(double) - Method in class actor.Actor
captures a value (within a guaranteed range) in the field health
setName(String) - Method in class actor.Actor
captures a reference-to-String value stored in local, stack-oriented local variable name, stores in heap-oriented SimpleStringProperty to implement the Observable design pattern.
setOpposingArmy(Army) - Method in class army.Army

simulator - package simulator
 
simulator - Variable in class army.Army
The reference-to-Simulator gives the Army access to the list of child Node objects maintained by the Simulator (which inherits from Group).
simulator - Variable in class simulator.FXLauncher
 
Simulator - Class in simulator
The Simulator class is composed of (HAS-A relationship) two Army objects.
Simulator(Stage) - Constructor for class simulator.Simulator
Constructs the two Army objects and captures the reference-to-Stage value in primaryStage.
SingletonRandom - Class in util
Singleton class that provides a simplified interface to random number generation using a Gaussian (normal) distribution
SingletonRandom() - Constructor for class util.SingletonRandom
private constructor is a key element in Singleton design pattern.
slowDown() - Method in class simulator.Simulator
 
smell - Variable in class actor.Orc
May be used for future functionality .
speed - Variable in class actor.Actor
influences speed of movement; stored in a SimpleDoubleProperty to implement the Observable design pattern.
speedController - Variable in class simulator.Simulator
 
speedUp() - Method in class simulator.Simulator
 
stageListControllerWindow - Variable in class simulator.Simulator
 
stageTableControllerWindow - Variable in class simulator.Simulator
 
start(Stage) - Method in class simulator.FXLauncher
The start() method is defined as an abstract method in class Application, thus you MUST Override the start() method.
startMotion(boolean) - Method in class actor.Actor
Defines the characteristics of a TranslateTransition.
startMotion() - Method in class army.Army
Iterates through the Collection of Actor objects and instructs each to begin (or resume) motion (ultimately using TranslateTransition objects that define animated movement).
stealth - Variable in class actor.Hobbit
Influences the visibility of this object; sufficiently high stealth means Hobbit object cannot be seen by others.
strength - Variable in class actor.Actor
influences degree of damage inflicted in skirmish with other players; stored in a SimpleDoubleProperty to implement the Observable design pattern.
suspend() - Method in class simulator.Simulator
Causes each Army to iterate through its Collection of Actor objects, cause each of them to suspend a TranslateTransition (using pause()).
suspendMotion() - Method in class army.Army
Iterates through the Collection of Actor objects and instructs each to suspend motion (ultimately using TranslateTransition objects that define animated movement).
